translations: n.[语]章；章节（chapter 的复数形式）；回

phrs.translation: 牧师会礼堂；（美）大学生联谊会分会所
接踵而来的灾祸；一连串未预料到的事情

sentences.sentence: I think you can get through the first two chapters.
Before you start on these chapters, clear your head.
sentences.translation: 在你开始这些章之前，先理清思路。

sentences.sentence: He picks up this theme again in later chapters of the book.
sentences.translation: 在该书的后几章，他又重回到这个主题上。
